1: @@//lam ye shes rgya mtsho <mistake>ste// byams</mistake> chen rang bzhin dpag tu <mistake>med//snying</mistake> rje chen po blo yi <mistake>mchog /shes</mistake> rab chen po <mistake>blo</mistake> <mistake>che na</mistake> <mistake>ldan//thabs</mistake> chen byed <mistake>za</mistake> chen po <mistake>ste//rdzu</mistake>
2: 'phrul chen po stobs <mistake>dang</mistake> <mistake>ldan//shugs</mistake> chen mgyogs pa <mistake>che na</mistake> po <mistake>ste//rdu</mistake> 'phrul chen po cher grags <mistake>pa// stobs</mistake> chen pha rol gnon pa <mistake>po //srid</mistake> pa'i ri <mistake>bao</mistake> <mistake>tchen</mistake> po <mistake>'joms//mkhregs</mistake>
3: shing rdo rje chen po <mistake>'chang//drag</mistake> po chen po drag shul <mistake>che//'jigs</mistake> chen 'jigs par byed pa <mistake>po //mgon</mistake> po rigs mchog chen po <mistake>ste//bla</mistake> ma gsang sngags che ba <mistake>mcog /theg</mistake> pa chen <mistake>po'i</mistake>
4: tshul gnas <mistake>pa//theg</mistake> <mistake>pa</mistake> chen <mistake>po'i</mistake> <mistake>chul</mistake> gyi <mistake>mchog /rdo</mistake> rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen <mistake>po'i</mistake> tshigs su bcad pa bcu <mistake>bzhi'o///sangs</mistake> rgyas rnam par snang mdzad <mistake>che//thub</mistake> pa chen po
5: thub <mistake>cen</mistake> <mistake>ldan//gsang</mistake> sngags tshul <mistake>cen</mistake> las byung <mistake>ba//gsang</mistake> sngags tshul chen bdag nyid <mistake>can //pha</mistake> rol phyin bcu thob pa <mistake>ste//pha</mistake> rol phyin pa bcu la <mistake>gnas//pha</mistake> rol phyin bcu dag
6: pa <mistake>ste//pha</mistake> rol phyin pa bcu <mistake>yi</mistake> <mistake>tshul//sae</mistake> <mistake>bcu'i</mistake> dbang phyug mgon po <mistake>ste//sa</mistake> bcu la ni rab tu <mistake>gnas//shes</mistake> bcu rnam dag bdag nyid <mistake>can//shes</mistake> bcu rnam dag 'chang ba bo // rnam <mistake>ba</mistake>
7: bcu po don <mistake>bcu'i</mistake> <mistake>don //thub</mistake> dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i <mistake>bdag kun</mistake> gyi don ni ma lus byed // rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba <mistake>po// thog</mistake> ma med pa spros med bdag / de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i
8: <mistake>bdag /yang</mistake> dag smra zhing <mistake>tshog</mistake> gzhan <mistake>med //ji</mistake> skad smra ba de bzhin <mistake>byed//gnyis</mistake> <mistake>su</mistake> med dang gnyis med <mistake>smra//yang</mistake> dag mtha' la rnam par <mistake>gnas//bdag</mistake> med <mistake>sedg+ge'i</mistake> <mistake>sgra</mistake> <mistake>dang ldan//nmu</mistake> stegs
